body:
Hi.


> Note also you could try installing the Debian Radiance package for
> compiled binaries:
> 
>    http://packages.ubuntu.com/hardy/graphics/radiance
> 
> However this appears to be for Hardy (8.04 development release) so I do
> not know if there are any issues running it on Gutsy (7.10 stable release).


you'd have to backport them for Gutsy.
Not sure if Ubuntu has something like Debian's backports.org, if so, you
could ask the people there to build backports of the packages.


If anybody is interested in packages for Debian Etch, please let me know
(or even better, write a wishlist bug report to the debian bts).


Cheers,


Bernd


Bernd Zeimetz
<bernd at bzed.de>                         <http://bzed.de/>
